song.title: Delon Mezign
song.info:
My first chip tune since I retired in 1993. A catchy melody is still the main ingredient IMO. I hope you all like. Should I write a chip album? replies to 'Mark "TDK" Knight' on Facebook please.
The Album, Reawakening, has now been released on Bandcamp, pay what you like (for a little while longer) - marktdkknight.bandcamp.com/album/reawakening-3
FLIT KILLS MOTHS!
Info taken from: [url=https://soundcloud.com/marktdkknight/delon-mezign]soundcloud[/url]
Find the album here: [url=http://marktdkknight.bandcamp.com/album/reawakening-3]bandcamp[/url]
